ConfirmEmail.title: Please confirm your email address
ConfirmEmail.content:
## Welcome on Caroster !
Please confirm your account by clicking on this link:

[<%= confirmationLink %>](<%= confirmationLink %>)

NewTrip.title: <%= event.name %> - A new trip is available
NewTrip.content:
## New trip is available for "<%= event.name %>"

**Car: <%= travel.vehicleName %>**
Count of seats: <%= travel.seats %>
Departure location: <%= travel.meeting %>
Information: <%= travel.details %>.

[Book my seat](<%= host %>/e/<%= event.uuid %>).

You are receiving this email because you are on the waiting list to find a carpool spot in this event.

NewTripAlert.title: <%= event.name %> - A new trip is available
NewTripAlert.content:
## New trip is available for "<%= event.name %>"

**Car: <%= travel.vehicleName %>**
Count of seats: <%= travel.seats %>
Departure location: <%= travel.meeting %>
Information: <%= travel.details %>.

[Book my seat](<%= host %>/e/<%= event.uuid %>).

You are receiving this email because you've enabled alerts in this event.

DeletedTrip.title: <%= event.name %> - Trip removed
DeletedTrip.content: The trip '<%= travel.vehicleName %>' in which you've subscribed to as been removed. You can try to find another available trip for you [here](<%= host %>/e/<%= event.uuid %>).

DeletedYourTrip.title: <%= event.name %> - Your trip has been removed
DeletedYourTrip.content: Your trip <%= travel.vehicleName %> has been removed by an administrator from [<%= event.name %>](<%= host %>/e/<%= event.uuid %>).

DeletedFromTrip.title: <%= event.name %> - You have been removed from a trip
DeletedFromTrip.content: You have been removed from the trip '<%= travel.vehicleName %>' for [<%= event.name %>](<%= host %>/e/<%= event.uuid %>).

NewPassengerInYourTrip.title: <%= event.name %> - A passenger has been added to your trip
NewPassengerInYourTrip.content: A passenger has been added to your trip on [<%= event.name %>](<%= host %>/e/<%= event.uuid %>)

AddedAsAdmin.title: You have been promoted as administrator to an event
AddedAsAdmin.content: You have been promoted as administrator to [<%= event.name %>](<%= host %>/e/<%= event.uuid %>).
